thread.title: Giants coach on Adrian Peterson: “Never say never”
thread.title_full: Giants coach on Adrian Peterson: “Never say never”

author: Darin Gantt
title: Giants coach on Adrian Peterson: “Never say never”
text:
5 Responses to “Giants coach on Adrian Peterson: “Never say never”” senatorblutarsky says: Mar 28, 2017 5:49 PM 
Peterson will show the Giants how to beat anyone. whatjusthapped says: Mar 28, 2017 5:49 PM 
It’s a game of Poker and Peterson clearly wants more than any team is willing to pay him so he will hold his hand and wait for a key injury so he has some leverage. 
His biggest problem is that the Vikings gave him $18M and the next highest paid RB in the entire NFL was less than $8M so he was overvalued for years with that contract. But the other 31 teams aren’t as mentally challenged as Rick Spielman, the best thing to happen to the Bears, Lions and Packers in several years. bondlake says: Mar 28, 2017 5:52 PM 
I don’t know about now, but I always wished that Green Bay could have had him during his prime. No one could have stopped the Pack with him in the backfield. No one. redlikethepig says: Mar 28, 2017 5:52 PM 
Coach speak … what else is he going to say? madmike66 says: Mar 28, 2017 5:54 PM 
“The Giants could clearly use someone who is an every-down back”. Yeah, but Adrian Peterson is not an every down back. Leave a Reply 
You must be logged in to leave a comment. Not a member? Register now! Search
